title: URF mode, Hexakill ect...
body: yo I'm back from a long break and i was wondering if you guys will be bringing out the awesome game modes again .... cheers

replies.body: Hey guys! I work on the team that does the featured game modes - I can't give a timeline, but we are definitely planning on doing more modes.
can we have a hexakill, all for one and URF all rolled into one on twisted treeline?

If the current trend is to be maintained URF will be back next April. Hexakill also already happened this year, so probably next year too. We just had the Bilgewater event but I assume a new/previous mode will come some time next month.
i really wish ascension would come back, that was the best
